participant_1.background:
My pets are always excited to see me when I come home from work, even if I've only been gone for a few hours.
i broke my nose in 5th grade.
I miss my parents a lot.
I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair.
i decided to become vegan a year ago.

participant_2.background:
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good.
I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp.
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.
I remember spending hours reading books in the library with my mom when I was a kid.
I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream of filmmaking.

content.text: Hi, I'm [user 1 name]. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing good too, thanks for asking.
That's great to hear. So, what are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out with my pets. What are you up to?
I'm getting ready to go to the gym. I usually start my day with a workout.
That's awesome! I used to work out a lot, but I've been slacking off lately.
You should start working out again! It's a great way to start your day and it really helps you feel good.
I know, I know. I'll start working out again soon.
Good! What are your hobbies?
I love to read, I love watching romantic comedies, and I love spending time with my family.
Reading is my favorite hobby too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! What's your favorite book?
I have a lot of favorite books, but one of my favorites is "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
That's a great book! I love the way Fitzgerald writes.
Me too! He's one of my favorite authors.
So, what do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be a filmmaker. I've always loved making movies and I think it would be a great career.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to make a movie too.
Maybe we can collaborate on a movie one day!
That would be so cool
